section.title: Using the Git commit dialog
section.para:
You can also commit changes with the Git commit dialog. For this right-click on a resource and select
Team Commit
from the context menu.
The dialog allows you to add changed and new files to the staging area and commit the changes.

textobject.phrase: Adding a file via the EGit commit dialog

note.para: The commit dialog does not allow committing the removal of a file, since the commit dialog ignores the Git index.
